decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (123456-A_A-XX-GF-DR-AX-30010, AX-30510, 123456-A_A-XX-03-DR-AX-30610, AX-47701, 123456-A_A-XX-02-DR-AX-30030, AX-91010, 123456-A_A-XX-GF-DR-AX-30010, AX-30510, AX-47701, 123456-A_A-XX-03-DR-AX-30610, Received: 23/11/2016. 123456-A_A-XX-01-DR-AX-30020, Received: 12/10/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Erection of a rear roof extension
